text: Yā pana bhikkhunī vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 120. Should any bhikkhunī chew or consume staple or non-staple food at the wrong time, it is to be confessed.
